deity.name: The Raven Queen
deity.text: The name of the god of death is long forgotten, but she is called the Raven Queen. She is the spinner of fate and the patron of winter. She marks the end of each mortal life, and mourners call upon her during funeral rites, in the hope that she will guard the departed from the curse of undeath. She expects her followers to:
► Hold no pity for those who suffer and die, for death is the natural end of life.
► Bring down the proud who try to cast off the chains of fate. As the instrument of the Raven Queen, you must punish hubris where you find it.
► Watch for the cults of Orcus and stamp them out whenever they arise. The Demon Prince of the Undead seeks to claim the Raven Queen's throne.

power.title: In Death, Life
power.fluff: Your powers of death revitalize your body

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You bloody an enemy or reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Target:
section.target: you or one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to allow the target to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must be shadar-kai.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of shadows until the start of your next turn.
Squares within the zone are heavily obstructed.

power.title: Raven Queen's Blessing
power.fluff: The Raven Queen grants a boon to those who send the dead on their way

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your attack reduces an enemy within 10 squares of you to 0 hit points

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, or an ally within 5 squares of the enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Raven Queen's Judgement
power.fluff: The undead exist in defiance of the Raven Queen's will, so you create a blast of utter cold to bring the abominations a clean death

section.name: Channel Divinity:

power.title: Shadow Legacy
